titles.title: We wish you a Merry Christmas2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: We wish you a Merry Christmas; newline We wish you a Merry Christmas; newline We wish you a Merry Christmas newline and a Happy New Year.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Good tidings we bring newline to you and your kin; newline Good tidings for Christmas newline and a Happy New Year.
